mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hospital_review (review_seq, com_num, user_id, content, user_nickname, regDate) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(review_seq),0 ) +1 FROM hospital_review H WHERE com_num = #{comNum}), #{comNum}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{userNickname}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT h.* , u.user_profile FROM hospital_review AS h INNER JOIN user AS u ON h.user_id = u.user_id WHERE h.com_num = #{comNum} order by h.review_seq DESC
